0.title: General Preparedness
tips: Maintain proper drainage in your home

1.title: Low Risk Precautions
tips: Secure important documents in waterproof bags
Charge mobile devices and keep powerbank ready

2.title: Medium Risk Actions
tips: Move to higher ground if instructed
Help elderly and vulnerable community members
Keep valuables and documents with you

3.title: High Risk - IMMEDIATE ACTION
tips: Do not wait for official evacuation orders
Help family and neighbors if safe
Do NOT attempt to cross flooded roads
Stay on high ground until all-clear given
